title: (x) Blood stain dingbats - FWISblot font {Adriano S}
content:
This is sort of unusual, but here goes...   
   
I'm looking for dingbats of differently-shaped bloodstains(to use on Paint), can anyone help.   
   
Thanks,   
ThreeChairsBlack
author: threechairblack

comments.content:
Chris Papasadero from fwis.com made an "ink drops" font... you can turn them into blood drops easily.   
   
 [http://www.fwis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20110326211911/http:/www.fwis.com/)

Wait,I just tried to install, and I cant find it.   
What's different about Opentype files?
Disregard the above post please, I found it. Thanks again and...um...topic closed.
